name: create_notion_page_ext
description: Create notion page by notion API. https://developers.notion.com/reference/post-page

inputArgs.name: parent
inputArgs.description: The parent page or database where the new page is inserted, represented as a JSON object with a page_id or database_id key, and the corresponding ID.(required)

inputArgs.name: properties
inputArgs.description: The values of the page’s properties. If the parent is a database, then the schema must match the parent database’s properties. If the parent is a page, then the only valid object key is title.(required)

inputArgs.name: children
inputArgs.description: The content to be rendered on the new page, represented as an array of block objects.(optional)

inputArgs.name: icon
inputArgs.description: The icon of the new page. Either an emoji object or an external file object.(optional)

inputArgs.name: cover
inputArgs.description: The cover image of the new page, represented as a file object.(optional)
